sentences.english: Or are we carrying microorganisms that may contaminate science experiments?

sentences.english: The third is to perform multi scientific experiments in the target spacecraft.

sentences.english: It was the start of the most ambitious scientific experiment in history.

sentences.english: Science works by conducting experiments that reveal how the world actually works.

sentences.english: Like a bad science experiment, it can cause explosions.
